channel.title: Modeling a Mitsubishi Eclipse (for maybe the next contest)
channel.description:
Alright, I'm modeling a Mitsubishi Eclipse 1999. It's going to be for RuneScape and maybe if the next contest is going to be about cars wich I hope this will enter the contest, but if dylan wants me not to join because I got pretty good cars skills It's fine for me as long as we can model cars. I could also join the judges if that is OK for dylan. However this is the plan: modeling a car for RuneScape is modeling a npc, after you've modeled the npc, you need to create an object and when you wear it, you pnpc into that npc and voila your done, tell me what you think about this. And also dylan or CJ or frell, what's the maximum squares for npc's? And if cars dont get chosen for the next modeling contest so be it, I'll finish this car and release it.
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/Untitsdfgsdfgsdfgled.png[/img]

item.title: Modeling a Mitsubishi Eclipse (for maybe the next contest)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Oh so pretty.

Lil tip, I’d extrude all the faces you’ve done so far by just a little, I mean, body work isn’t just a 2 dimensional sheet of paper. If you were to do the interior then it would be a lot more realistic.

Read full topic

item.title: Modeling a Mitsubishi Eclipse (for maybe the next contest)
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:3, topic:329436”]Nobody said the modeling contest will be for cars, in fact, it probably won’t. Besides, now that you posted it, it can’t be entered if the modeling contest in fact is cars.[/quote]i can remove this, and i can make another car and i didnt say its going to be cars i said i HOPE because dylan said that cars is a cool idea and mitsubishi eclispe is my fav car

EDIT: After 30 mins of modeling i got to this point:

Untitledertertertert.png1024×640

Untitled-18.png1024×640

EDIT: I SEPERATED THE HOOD AS YOU CAN SEE

Untitled-19.png1024×640

Read full topic
